    • Method Detail

      • speedRange

        public static int[][] speedRange(Unit unit,
                 BattleMap map)
        Uses Dijkstra's algorithm to calculate the distances to other nodes through shortests paths from starting node. Paths themselves are not stored. Converts Node array into int array for use by the game.
        Parameters:
        unit - unit's tile is the algorithm's start node
        map - weights are pulled from here
        Returns:
        Weights of shortests paths from start tile.
        See Also:
        dijkstraWithHeap

      • getTilesToMoveTo

        public static ArrayList<Node> getTilesToMoveTo(Unit unit,
                               BattleMap map)
